{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Cubieboard1 logo.jpg |image1_size = 300px |caption = Single Board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://cubieboard.org/model/cb1/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Cubietech_Cubieboard |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Cubietech |model = Cubieboard |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 1 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = July 17, 2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Cubietech_Cubieboard |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A10; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A8 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9GBG08U0A-SCB0; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Genius;GT8UB256M16BP-BG; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Realtek;RTL8201CP; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 02:17:05
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA, MicroSD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 1.7 |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = 4 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI out, Audio in/out (3.5mm) |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = <!-- Yes, or No, --> |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 09/09/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}}

==See also== *[[Cubietech Cubietruck]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard]] - ''Allwinner'' A10 1-cores ARM Cortex-A8 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 2]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 3]] - ''Allwinner'' A20 2-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @1.0GHz :Wi-Fi: [[Broadcom]] BCM4329, BT: [[Broadcom]] BCM40181, GbE [[Realtek]] RTL8211E *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 4]] - ''Allwinner'' A80 SoC (4-cores ARM Cortex-A15 and :4-cores ARM Cortex-A7 big.LITTLE), GPU: PowerVR G6230, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz) *[[Cubietech Cubieboard 5]] - ''Allwinner'' H8 8-cores ARM Cortex-A7 CPU @2.0GHz :GPU: PowerVR SGX544 @700MHz, Toshiba TC358777XBG, Wi-Fi (2.4/5GHz)
